titleStmt.title: Some collections of scripture, with private mediations as an help in prayer, with some hymns and psalms of David. Cum humilitatis reverentia. By G. M.
titleStmt.author: G. M., fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: With errata on recto of final leaf at foot.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: A form of prayer in scripture-phrase.
Copy imperfect; cropped at head and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
